Banner.Description: I have 2 years of experience in developing websites and backend systems using Spring Boot. I am currently working at RNInfosys in Narhegaon, Pune, for the past 9 months, where I have built three mobile applications and contributed to three projects using skills like Java, Angular, MySQL, and Android. My technical skills also include JavaScript, C#, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, as well as experience with tools like Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Visual Studio, Maven, and Git. I have experience in database management with Oracle and MySQL and frameworks such as React.js, Spring MVC, Spring Boot, and Hibernate. I am committed to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code while adhering to best practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 2 years as a developer, I seek to learn and grow every day. I have experience in developing websites and backend systems using Spring Boot, as well as building mobile applications at RNInfosys, where I've contributed to various projects using Java, Angular, MySQL, and Android.
I focus on implementing system improvements, optimizing applications, and standardizing patterns to enhance project value.
I have completed several courses, including Full Stack Java Development, C Programming, Java Programming, and Spring Framework.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Full Stack Developer
Description: Developed and deployed three Android applications, enhancing mobile user experiences and meeting client specifications.
Built web applications using Angular for the frontend, integrating with Spring Boot and MySQL on the backend to provide robust, scalable solutions.
Collaborated closely with team members to design and implement complex business logic and database models.
Optimized system performance through back-end improvements and front-end optimizations, reducing load times and increasing app stability.
Participated in code reviews, troubleshooting, and testing to ensure high-quality product releases.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Contributions to Company Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: My School
Description: A Next Generation School Management System application made from scratch with an auth module, configurable graphics, configurable alarms, and user management. It also has feedback form logic for parameter configuration.
Created both Android and web applications for the system, handling tasks like admission, TC, bonafide certification, attendance, and fee management.
Utilized Angular for the web frontend and Spring Boot with MySQL for the backend, ensuring a robust and scalable system.
Led the integration of core functionalities, improving adaptability and efficiency in school operations.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: MY BET
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: My Bet is a Satta Matka app where users can participate in betting games with a user-friendly interface. It includes live chat, betting history, notifications via SMS and email, secure user authentication, and integrated payment gateway for secure transactions.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: ERP
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This ERP system is built to empower product and service-based companies by seamlessly managing inventory, sales, purchasing, and customer relationships. It includes a comprehensive authentication module, customizable dashboards for real-time analytics, automated alerts, user and role management, and geolocation features with OpenLayers. This ERP enables companies to streamline operations, optimize resources, and enhance customer satisfaction.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: My Universal Service
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This platform is a comprehensive marketplace where users can book any type of service, from home repairs to professional consultations, while also offering e-commerce capabilities for administrators to sell a wide variety of products. The platform includes a user-friendly service booking system, secure payment integration, order tracking, real-time notifications, and robust admin tools for inventory and service management.

OtherProjects.Title: personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: PulseGuard Tailwind Network
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: PulseGuard Tailwind Network connects blood donors with those in need by allowing donors to register their blood type, location, and availability.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Delicious Eats
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Delicious Eats is a website designed to manage restaurant orders efficiently.

Items.Title: Full Stack Java Development
Description: Comprehensive training in Full Stack Development, focusing on Java technologies, including both frontend and backend development.
Developed RESTful APIs and worked with databases, enhancing practical skills in software development.

Items.Title: C Programming
Description: Mastered the fundamentals of C programming, with a focus on data structures and algorithms.
Completed projects that demonstrated proficiency in algorithm design and problem-solving.

Items.Title: Java Programming
Description: Completed advanced Java programming training, emphasizing object-oriented principles and design patterns.
Worked on multiple projects to build robust Java applications.

Items.Title: Spring Framework
Description: Gained expertise in the Spring Framework, focusing on building scalable applications.
Hands-on projects included creating web applications using Spring MVC and Spring Boot.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
